properties.entry: 1-1. 주문 및 배송 조회 주문번호 SELECT OR_NO FROM MEMBER M JOIN ORDER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE M.MEM_NO = ?
1-2. 주문 및 배송 조회 주문 상품 상세내용 SELECT IMAGE_URL ,P_NAME ,PRICE ,OR_DATE FROM MEMBER M JOIN ORDER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN OR_PRODUCT USING(OR_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING(P_CODE) WHERE MEM_NO = ? WHERE OR_NO = ?
2. 주문 취소/ 환불 SELECT P_NAME ,OR_DATE ,PRICE ,IMAGE_URL ,O.OR_NO FROM MEMBER M JOIN ORDER O USING(MEM_NO) JOIN OR_PRODUCT USING(OR_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING(P_CODE) WHERE M.MEM_NO = ?
